channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Vantara -- Pentaho Business Analytics Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Vantara -- Pentaho Business Analytics Server

item.title: CVE-2023-1158|2024-08-02T05:40:57.915Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 9.4.0.1 and 9.3.0.3, including 8.3.x expose dashboard prompts to users who are not part of the authorization list.

item.title: CVE-2023-2358|2024-08-02T06:19:14.897Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.5.0.0 and 9.3.0.4, including 8.3.x.x, saves passwords of the Hadoop Copy Files step in plaintext.

item.title: CVE-2024-28982|2024-07-09T19:15:50.518Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x do not correctly protect the ACL service endpoint of the Pentaho User Console against XML External Entity Reference.

item.title: CVE-2024-28983|2024-06-27T14:48:13.210Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-28982|2024-06-26T22:37:01.285Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x do not correctly protect the ACL service endpoint of the Pentaho User Console against XML External Entity Reference.
